title: Rainy city driving, moderate speed, no significant braking
caption: The ego vehicle drives down a rainy city street, following a blue car.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 2 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is rainy (softRainNoon). The ego vehicle is driving at a moderate speed (average speed â‰ˆ 8.2 m/s). No significant braking is observed in this window.
description: The road is wet from the rain, and there are several other cars on the street. The traffic lights are visible in the distance, and there is a large building on the right side of the road. The weather is foggy, and the visibility is slightly reduced.
reasoning: The ego vehicle maintains a moderate speed to ensure safety on the wet road. It follows the blue car ahead, keeping a safe distance to avoid any potential accidents. The driver is cautious and attentive, adjusting the speed and direction according to the traffic conditions and the visibility.
